Name: Alajuela
Description: A province known for its lush landscapes, including coffee plantations and the Arenal Volcano.

Name: Cartago
Description: A province rich in history and culture, home to the sacred Basilica of Our Lady of the Angels and the Irazú Volcano.

Name: Guanacaste
Description: A coastal province known for its beautiful beaches, dry tropical forests, and national parks.

Name: Heredia
Description: A province known for its coffee-growing regions and being home to the Costa Rican National University.

Name: Limon
Description: A Caribbean province known for its Afro-Caribbean culture, tropical rainforests, and rich biodiversity.

Name: Puntarenas
Description: A province with a large coastal area, famous for its beaches, including those in the Nicoya Peninsula.

Name: San Jose
Description: The capital province, the political and cultural heart of Costa Rica, and home to the nation s capital, San José.
